name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync daily tasks or work between Basecamp & Moon HRM. Use filters & enhanced features for seamless collaboration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp

Link Projects, Track Time, Generate Time Logs, Manage Workflow, and Do a Lot More By Integrating Our Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp Extension with Basecamp.

Description

While you need to link your Basecamp projects with Moon HRM or Moon Invoice, we help you do that with a breeze by downloading the Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp. The extension is designed to simplify your ongoing workflow, including project todos, card status, time logs, workflow, workload summary, timesheets, and more. 

Benefits of Integrating Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp

Your company can track each little progress of the Basecamp sprints and todos using our extension. Here are reasons for choosing our extension for your Basecamp project management and time tracking.

-   Estimate & Total Hours Management
-   Work Report Sync with Moon HRM
-   Todo Status Management 
-   Link Projects to Moon HRM & Moon Invoice
-   Various Filter Options
-   Sync Todos With App
-   Link Project Directly or Create Projects
-   Expand and Collapse the Group
-   Card Table Spent Hours Management
-   Card Table View
-   Workload Summary
-   Project Wise Commenting
-   Manage Time Logs
-   Timesheet Management
-   Sprint Date & Time Management

How Does It Work?

Download Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp Extension & follow these steps.

  1. Login to your Basecamp 
  2. On the top right corner of the screen, click on the sign-up button
  3. Choose Moon HRM or Moon Invoice while signing up
  4. Sign up with Moon HRM or Moon Invoice as per your selected option
  5. Add and manage projects and workflow with time log reports

How Does It Help?

1: Integrating with Moon HRM

Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp integration using Moon HRM is best for managing the workflow of your team members. It helps track each sprint’s card or todo status management and the time to complete the assigned tasks. The integration automatically allows the time log for each employee as per the tasks completed or time dedicated for each task. Using Moon HRM integration, the project manager can closely monitor each sprint’s progress, thereby checking the performance and status of each employee’s tasks.

2: Integrating with Moon Invoice

Integrating Time Tracker, Todo, Sprint Manager - Basecamp with Moon Invoice helps link the projects and sync the todos with the application. The time logs are generated per the time spent on each todo or sprint, which can be overwritten or edited as per the requirements. The project or account manager can use Moon Invoice integration to tally the time logs and generate accurate timesheets for the linked projects.
